Sinopse: "This is Our Christmas" tells the story of love, redemption, courage, and the importance of helping others: A spoiled Beverly Hills teenager finds the true meaning of the holidays; a father tries to help his daughter overcome the loss of her mother while helping the failing business of a country-style bakery. This evergreen film follows the Foxworth family and their magical guardian angel who assists them in realizing the true miracle of Christmas.
